TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UserControl extends System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl

summary.span: 提供一个可用来创建其他控件的空控件。

span.span: Provides an empty control that can be used to create other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过扩展，继承所有标准定位和在用户控件中是必需的助记键处理代码。By extending , inherits all the standard positioning and mnemonic-handling code that is necessary in a user control. 使您能够创建可以在应用程序或组织内的多个位置使用的控件。The gives you the ability to create controls that can be used in multiple places within an application or organization. 可以包括所有所需的常见数据要求用户输入; 的验证代码一些示例包括电子邮件地址 （请参阅示例部分），电话号码和邮政编码。You can include all the code needed for validation of common data you ask the user to input; some examples of this are email addresses (see Example section), telephone numbers, and postal codes. 另一个有效地使用用户控件是只需预加载或静态项您通常使用几乎每个应用程序中; 其中的一些示例是国家/地区、 城市、 州和办公地点。Another efficient use of the user control is to simply preload a or with static items you commonly use in almost every application; some examples of this are countries/regions, cities, states, and office locations. 有关创作自定义控件的详细信息，请参阅[开发自定义 Windows 窗体控件与.NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md)。For more information about authoring custom controls, see [Developing Custom Windows Forms Controls with the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/developing-custom-windows-forms-controls.md). > [!NOTE] > 您可能会考虑创建包含用户控件的几个类的命名空间并将其编译为一个 DLL。You might consider creating a namespace that contains several classes of user controls and compiling it into one DLL. 可以引用此 DLL，并将其与应用程序或组织内的所有应用程序一起分发。This DLL can be referenced and distributed with the application or all applications within an organization. 这使您能够引用用户控件在许多应用程序并节省时间布局和编码的用户控件包含的元素。This gives you the ability to reference the user control in many applications and save time laying out and coding the contained elements of the user control. 用户控件还提供一致性内或跨应用程序;例如，所有的地址信息输入的块将所有具有相同的外观和行为。A user control also gives you consistency within or across applications; for example, all address information input blocks will all have the same appearance and behavior. 一致性为你的应用程序提供了更加完善、 专业的外观。Consistency gives your application a more polished and professional appearance. > > 可以承载 Windows 窗体派生的类在窗体中，在另一台内部，在 Internet Explorer 对网页或内部窗体上承载控件。You can host Windows Forms derived classes inside of a form, on another , inside of Internet Explorer on a Web page, or inside a control hosted on a form. > [!NOTE] > 托管时的内部控件，您不能关闭使用视觉样式`META`标记值`MSThemeCompatible`。When hosting a inside of the control, you cannot turn off Visual Styles using the `META` tag value `MSThemeCompatible`. 视觉样式的详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information about Visual Styles, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 请注意，对于智能手机应用程序，此控件要求 Windows Mobile 版本 5.0 软件智能手机。Note that for Smartphone applications, this control requires Windows Mobile Version 5.0 software for Smartphones. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，可以在多个应用程序获取用户信息中重复使用。The following code example creates a that can be reused in multiple applications to get user information. 此示例中添加了多种控件，控件和一个到来收集用户的信息。This example adds several controls, controls and an to the to gather the user's information. 此外，在中验证用户的电子邮件地址的事件和对象用于在数据未能通过验证为用户提供反馈。Additionally, the user's email address is validated in the event of the and the object is used to give the user feedback if the data fails validation. 此代码应编译为对其他应用程序中引用的 DLL。The code is intended to be compiled into a DLL for reference in other applications. [!code-cpp[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不应创建的实例。You do not typically create an instance of . 若要创建用户控件类，继承自类。To create your own user control class, inherit from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的实例派生的类， `MyCustomerInfoUserControl`，这在的示例部分中创建类概述。The following code example creates an instance of the derived class, `MyCustomerInfoUserControl`, which was created in the example section of the class overview. 该用户控件添加到控件并具有其属性设置为。The user control is added to a control and has its property set to . 随后将添加到。The is then added to a . [!code-cpp[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic UserControl.UserControl Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic UserControl.UserControl Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置控件将如何调整其自身大小。

span.span: Gets or sets how the control will resize itself.
A value from the enumeration.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件不能识别属性将正常工作，如同已设置为。Controls that do not recognize the property will function as though was set to . 识别的所有控件属性将默认情况下，增加以适应可用空间，但下面指定的值都不会收缩属性。All controls that recognize the property will, by default, grow to fit available space, but will not shrink below the value specified by the property.

A member of the enumeration.
The default value for is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AutoValidateChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果自定义控件不执行任何其自身的验证，你将需要开发人员使用您的控件发生更改属性，以便可以相应地更改控件的验证行为。If your custom control performs any of its own validation, you will need to know when a developer using your control has changed the property so that you can change your control's validation behavior accordingly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`UserControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `UserControl1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#641](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#641)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#641](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#641)]

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为，该控件具有凹下的三维外观。When the property is set to , the control has a sunken, three-dimensional appearance. 若要显示平面的细边框，请设置属性设置为。To display a flat, thin border, set the property to .

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The assigned value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Load As EventHandler

summary.span: 在控件第一次变为可见之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before the control becomes visible for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用于执行任务，例如分配控件使用的资源。You can use this event to perform tasks such as allocating resources used by the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果属于的 MDI 子窗体，事件会显示子窗体的每个时间。If the is part of an MDI child form, the event will occur each time the child form is shown. 在这种情况下，您应该将任何一次性初始化代码置于而不是事件处理程序。In this case, you should put any one-time initialization code in the instead of a event handler. > [!CAUTION] > 事件发生时的句柄创建。The event occurs when the handle for the is created. 在某些情况下，这可能会导致事件发生一次。In some circumstances, this can cause the event to occur more than one time. 例如，事件发生时加载，并再次如果重新创建句柄。For example, the event occurs when the is loaded, and again if the handle is recreated. (一个句柄重新创建的一种方法是通过调用方法。)考虑事件发生一次，应将放置于初始化代码将在任何时候构造函数而不是事件处理程序。(One way that a handle is recreated is by calling the method.) To account for the event occurring more than one time, you should put any one time initialization code in the constructor instead of a event handler. 此外，不应添加到的数据绑定在事件处理程序。In addition, you should not add data bindings to the in a event handler. 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`UserControl1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `UserControl1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#642](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#642)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#642](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#642)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnCreateControl() cil managed

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建控件后，但该控件第一次变得可见之前发生的事件。The event occurs after the control is created, but before the control becomes visible for the first time. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
